author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place all of the ingredients together in a food processor, pulse until smooth and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  To serve, transfer the mackerel mixture to a small serving bowl with toasted bread or crackers on the side.
ingredients: 1 can mackerel fillets, drained,  30g/1oz butter,  ½ tsp chilli flakes,  1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  ½ lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
